content.text: Hey! I'm interested in talking to someone new, how are you?
Hey there! I'm doing great, thanks! How about yourself?
I'm doing good, thanks for asking! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to sing broadway show tunes, read mystery novels, and go on vacations. What about you?
I like to play jazz piano, run track, and spend time with my child. What's it like being a musician?
It's a lot of fun! I love getting to play music with other people and performing for a crowd. What's it like being a runner?
It's pretty challenging, but it's also really rewarding. I love the feeling of pushing myself to my limits and seeing how far I can go.
That's awesome! I wish I had that kind of discipline.
It takes a lot of work, but it's worth it.
So, what are you up to today?
Not much, just hanging out and relaxing. What about you?
I'm going to be working on a new song for my band.
That sounds fun! I'd love to hear it when it's finished.
I'll be sure to send you a link
